architecture.augmentations.consumables

Interface Consumable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Item
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NominalPotion, Potion, RecoveryPotion

    public interface Consumable
extends Item
    Represents items which can be consumed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean use(Player player)
      Uses the item, activating its effect and removing it from the inventory.

    • Method Detail

      • use

        boolean use(Player player)
        Uses the item, activating its effect and removing it from the inventory.
        Parameters:
        player - the player
        Returns:
        true if used successfully, else false
